mapper.select: SELECT p.project_id, p.user_id, p.project_name, p.remote_availability, p.work_location, p.job_description, p.programming_language, p.remarks, u.name FROM project_tbl p JOIN user_tbl u ON p.user_id = u.user_id WHERE p.user_id = #{userId} AND p.delete_flag = 0 ORDER BY p.project_id ASC
